website_summaries.verdict: This versatile putter may help you gain a competitive advantage during a golf match.
pros: Mallet-style putter makes it simple to make contact with a golf ball
Grip is both large and soft
Outstanding construction ensures the putter is built to last
Less expensive than many comparable putters
cons: May be too light for some golfers
Finish may wear down over time

customer_reviews.title: Club falling apart already. Would NOT recommend purchasing this club.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this club less than a year and play golf less than 10 times a season and it is already falling apart. I tried to contact Wilson directly but they will not handle any inquiries sold by third parties (Amazon) and will only issue refunds if you purchased on Wilson.com directly. Worked well the first couple times but very disappointed with the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this...then returned it. I've become a later-in-life avid golfer. I wanted to upgrade from my very dated putter. But I thought I could do it on the cheap. So I bought this putter. As soon as I opened the package, it was apparent that this putter was of average quality (at best) and it just didn't feel right in my hands. A little too light, not balanced quite right? If you're serious about your game, I'd suggest spending at least twice as much as this putter costs and for a brand more associated with quality golf equipment. If your a very occasional player - a few times a year, or less - this will probably do you fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter for the price. Nice weight. I three-putt much less often (also, cussing has decreased by 20%).
customer_reviews.author: Micah D

customer_reviews.title: I don't know- give it a try
customer_reviews.text: The problem here is that I don't want to spend serious money on golf clubs. So... I hunt around for bargains. This club is not a bargain. A bargain is when you discover something costing way less than it's actual value. Don't get me wrong--this putter gets the job done. I am using it now. But I am not sure I am going to stick with it. I find myself having to put a little more power in my stroke. It is accurate and I like the grip.
customer_reviews.author: PETE

customer_reviews.title: hoped for more
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the putter, and the grip is just the right size. The putter head is not distracting, so my eyes stay on the ball and not the putter. The ball comes off the putter well. My only complaint, which is big one for me, is that the design makes it impossible to pick up a golf ball off the putting green. Because of that, I wouldn't recommend this putter for anyone who hates bending down all of the time to pick the ball up. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great putter, soft feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the cheapest club in my bag, along with a wilson 60 degree wedge that's awesome also, and works just as well as the others. I bought all new clubs this year, driver through wedges, and was struggling putting with a bettinardi blade I had so i gave this a chance for the price and I love it. I've been putting well since purchasing it. It shows you how overpriced the big OEM's are.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna C.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, bad balance
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, built well, and has a nice grip. But them the balance is horrible and the putter head is much too light vs the shaft and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Birchman

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing quality. Grip feels cheap. Looked beat up after two rounds. Not doing another Wilson putter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Buy, Buy, Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this putter! I'm sorta new to golf and had an old putter that was handed down to me that was about 10 years old. I couldn't hole anything with it. After purchasing this putter I've improved drastically on my putts. Great putter for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use putter
customer_reviews.text: Weight is just right, reference markings work well and feel of swing and ball contact is outstanding. this is my second one and when I kill it I'll get another. Damn, I wish I could putt.
customer_reviews.author: mike bohan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Solid Option
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is worth getting especially if you are not a serious golfer who expects top notch quality and performance. It is not soft, but after getting used to it, I have been very comfortable with it. I say the grip is the best part of the club. The black paint does chip off easily, but doesn't affect the performance of the putter. I would get a different putter if I wanted the highest quality and performance, but for me, this putter does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: Best putter I've ever played with. I would give 5/5 on accuracy accept I notice when I torque it just slightly to the left (right handed golfer) So torque towards a pull ever so slightly the ball goes where I want it to go. I don't know if that is due to my natural swing or what, but if I don't torque just slightly...couple of mm's... I'm off target
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Putter for a Very Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband played two rounds with this putter and he likes the feel, balance, and weight. He thinks it will improve his game, but we will see. It also looks nice and appears well made. If necessary, one might be able to fend-off a surprised rattler near the green with the sharp, backside of the club; but we usually just let them wander off on their own accord. Got to love desert golf courses!
customer_reviews.author: Birdchick

customer_reviews.title: Great item at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great putter for a great price. Grip is comfortable and the markings on the putter head make it easy to line up your shot. Very happy with the purchase of this item. I would recommend this putter for the beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great putter.
customer_reviews.text: This putter is very easy to make sure your head is in the right place, and easy to line up. The weight is nice, not too light as some have said. The balance is quite nice, as i can hover the putter off the ground and it stays almost perfectly still, even through my swing.
customer_reviews.author: shadow0861

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter for the money
customer_reviews.text: I came across this putter while looking at expensive putters. I read the previous reviews and for the price, figured I'd give it a try. I find the putter easy to control and I am finding the center of the cup with it. The feel is superb. I can't believe I am using an inexpensive putter while my expensive name brand sits in my bag. I strongly recommend this putter.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G.

customer_reviews.title: Best grip, DEAD putter head
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip. 5 out 5 stars for that. BUT the putter head is dead. You almost have to take a full swing to make the ball go to the hole. I would not recommend this to anyone. If you replace the putter head with a regular flat metal head it would be a perfect putter because this grip is fantatic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great putter
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has an amazing grip in my opinion. However it isn't terribly durable as mine already has many marks on the top of the face(I have been playing at least 18-27 holes everyday for the past 3 weeks with this putter and overall I would consider this a good buy for anyone who wants a nice putter for cheap.) It has been a big upgrade for my putting game.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: price & great feel
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st mallet style putter. I bot the M2 because of the style and lines on top for alignment. I now have fewer 3 putts and more 1 putts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Putter for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the jumbo grip on this putter. Even though the head is fairly heavy the heavy grip changes the balance of the club and it takes time to get used to. Not my favorite putter, but for the price it's hard to beat. I would recommend for a new golfer or someone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Handicap 20s, age 70s, I needed a new putter to help me through some persistent yips. This item is well made with good weight and feel and, when I remember to keep my head down, produces a clean, consistent roll. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: nigelg

customer_reviews.title: Better gsme
customer_reviews.text: It's much lighter than other putters. Which gives me more feel when coming in contact with the ball, the club has helped me improve my game very much.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Good putter for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I returned this putter. I didn't like the feel of the ball strike and balance. I do think it's a good putter for a beginner at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetFanatic

customer_reviews.title: High quality but heavy
customer_reviews.text: High quality club, but it’s definitely on the heavy side. The grip is big and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the box and took the plastic off the club, I noticed blemishes on the club. Hopefully they don’t send their products to others in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chun

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled it out of the box I was very impressed. It feels great in my hands, it's well balanced, and the value is totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Klug

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand and hits the ball smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry&Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great putter. Great balance, great grip, and very nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Putter feels well balanced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this putter for an extra. It feels a little heavier and more balanced than the stock putter that came with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Napper

customer_reviews.title: Great putter for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that I am putting better with this one. Had an older mallet putter and have used a blade but I seem to have more control on distance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a nice putter
customer_reviews.text: Feels right, has the "soft" face for a nice feel. Weight is right and quality of construction seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap grip, but still a good putter
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve enjoyed all the Wilson clubs I had the grip was the biggest let down I ordered the jumbo grip. The jumbo grip is constructed of a grippy polymer but it feels and look extremely cheap but still worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to son’s bag
customer_reviews.text: Great thick grip and soft putter face. Keeps son from over hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Erik N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the sport and picked this up purely on looks, but actually performs well. I have holed some pretty decently challenging outs with it and to my belief because of how consistent it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Samulski

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this putter. It has great alignment lines and an excellent grip. It is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T

customer_reviews.title: Swell putter for a high handicap with a limited budget
customer_reviews.text: I'm not good enough to spend a lot of money on a putter, so I really felt like I was splurging when I purchased this one. Weight , grip , balance is just fine, and a number of the better golfers that I see at the course have commented on the quality of my purchase. My putting has improved and I couldn't be happier. Best 28 bucks I have spent in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great putter for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great putter for the money. However the grip was not installed with the proper alignment. This was not a problem for me because I installed an oversized grip immediately after I got it. My putting so far has improved several putts per round. Putter lines up nice with my sight..
customer_reviews.author: Ohio man

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to see how nicely the club was made, and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M.

customer_reviews.title: Good putter, good price, and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.text: The putter looks brand new, I got it a day early and at half price too. Pretty good deal actually. I don't see the point in paying full price for a fancy putter unless it's actual very helpful for putting control. Price tag does not equal performance or service 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Neither good nor bad
customer_reviews.text: Just experimenting with putters, picked one of these up in a big box sports store and if felt good. Amazon's price was much better, so I gave it a shot. A good basic putter, but it's not my "go to" one, just a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got mine Monday! Haven't been to the course yet, but on practice pad at home, dropping 5-6 footers like Butter! Feels Totally balanced, insert gives the ball a nice "click" and alignment is spot-on! Can't wait to get to the course and say "So Long" to 3 and 4-putts!
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: A good step up before picking that $300 putter of your ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a decent putter for the intermediate golfer. A little more weight at bottom would be an improvement. A good step up before picking that $300 putter of your dreams.
customer_reviews.author: r.a. glenn

customer_reviews.title: Plays great
customer_reviews.text: it puts. takes some getting used to. weighs a little more than my previous putter.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Great putter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this putter from the stock on that came with my set. Much better feel and control. The grip is nice. Taking me a little getting used to since it’s a larger putter but I see it already making improvements in my short game.
customer_reviews.author: JLNewton

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: Putter is definitely a good club for the price. My problem is personal, I don’t like the oversized grip🤣 I am using it though and will either get used to it or change the grip
customer_reviews.author: Redfox

customer_reviews.title: Great putter, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight, and love the price. I'm a budget golfer (I like to purchase used clubs, I would never buy a $500 set, that's crazy to me), and this is my best putter. Great grip, natural putt.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: Don't cheap out on a putter. This is way too light. You'll have to muscle every put and you'll be doubting yourself the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Conwell

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Putter!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old son uses this and it performs great for him!
customer_reviews.author: Big Country 1967

customer_reviews.title: but it worked great. I'm afraid winter has arrived here and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only had one chance to use it, but it worked great. I'm afraid winter has arrived here and we won't be heading south for another 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MARC O FOUNTAIN

customer_reviews.title: Gave this putter as a gift to my son who ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this putter as a gift to my son who used it the National Police Olympics and won a silver metal in the two man contest
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Secor

customer_reviews.title: Nice form and weight but low grip and rubber quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for the price, but the rubber doesn't seems to make the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s got a great grip on it and seems to be well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: gocubsgo1908

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other putters like this, isn't so heavy. Great weight; not too heavy; not too light. It gives you a nice feel. Only problem, it's not easy to pick ball off the surface with the head of the putter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I've paid 300 dollars for putters this is my favorite putter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this putter's head weight does the work for you!! It does take a little getting used! The head is heavier than my old one but the accuracy is much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this putter. This is the second one he has ordered. Hr has a $300.00 putter sitting the corner. Drives me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Schnurr

customer_reviews.title: horrible golf club
customer_reviews.text: Has dead spots all over the club ...has 0 consistancy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Good putter
customer_reviews.text: Received club with minor scratch. Overall I'm happy with the putter.
customer_reviews.author: YoAdrian

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Great weight, nice soft face. Didn’t realize when ordering but matches my golf bag :)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Priced right, very good putter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace a 25 year old Wilson Harmonized Putter, the price was right and I'm very pleased. You will not go wrong purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Frost

customer_reviews.title: I am not short putting any more!!
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, great price. Heavy enough that I am swinging harder and not short putting
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Its inexpensive but in no way cheap.Feels good,nice contact,I am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: and didn't want to spend a lot to see if I like the change in feel
customer_reviews.text: 1st time back to a blade-like putter in many years, and didn't want to spend a lot to see if I like the change in feel. It has served its purpose and is a great putter for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Goleno

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, perfect for beginners. Has a bit of a numb feel and grip is very rubbery.
customer_reviews.author: Mynhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This putter is every bit as good as my more expensive putters. I bought this one for the style, never tried a mallet putter before. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tierney

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to lineup
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to lineup, it is easy to line up , the group is a little longer than normal . Great putter for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great puttern
customer_reviews.text: Brooke my long time putter But happy I did this is a very nice putter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insert is already falling out on putter face.
customer_reviews.text: Putter is not of quality standard. Insert on face of putter is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy putter for the price. Great for beginners, but now that I've practiced some, I don't care for the 'pick up' ball extension.
customer_reviews.author: Beewax

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice putter for the price. Good weight and nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: K.McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Grip is nice. Great feel when hitting the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Love this Putter
customer_reviews.text: I simply LOVE this putter, so much I bought a second one for a backup, don't know what it is but I've made a Ton of putts with it, its not expensive and for me it works great!! Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hunt jr

customer_reviews.title: Way too light!!
customer_reviews.text: The putter is too light. It feels like you have to smack the ball to get it to travel the correct distance
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great feel at address. Very good quality for price. Grip is best part of this putter. Very soft and good sized. Probably the best stock grip I've seen on a putter.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: Nice, inexpensive putter. I was looking for a new cheap putter. This is just that. I've only played with it a couple times. But, so far I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better putters I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: One of the better putters I have ever purchased. This will be in use all through my college career and possibly longer. This putter is easy to line up, and sits level on the ground. There is no reason to buy a blade putter for hundreds of dollars. Buy this. If you like blade putters, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Like it just fine
customer_reviews.text: Like it just fine. Goes where you aim it. Good value for a solid feeling putter. Bought it for my spare bag
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: great ballance
customer_reviews.text: supper putter for the price. better than my high dollar Scotty Cameran
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner putter
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner putter. No need to spend too much on a putter when beginning to play golf. This will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Damaged?
customer_reviews.text: It looks like I got a used on. The back of the putter seems to have be hit on some concrete putting some gouging in the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Maricic

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel
customer_reviews.text: Quality putter. Love the feel. Cant say it made my game better or not but I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Justin sinisi

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong putter....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the M5 putter from the picture and the description but received an M3 putter instead.
customer_reviews.author: bret k

customer_reviews.title: Putter in the picture doesn’t match
customer_reviews.text: Putter is fine except it isn’t the one that I ordered. The picture is of a harmonized M5 and the one I received is a harmonized M3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture and Description do not match!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to order the M2 putter twice, and twice received the M3. Something is off with the site ... Don't trust this order!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Great putter, the only change I made was to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, the only change I made was to change the grip to an oversized grip. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the new putters grip and weight. Very good club for the price. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: David Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Have made a great deal of putts watching the ball roll right to ...
customer_reviews.text: Have made a great deal of putts watching the ball roll right to the hole. I reccomend this putter to anyone who wants to improve their putting...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was an M5 but I got an M3.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finishing is good but it's too light for a putter
customer_reviews.author: Suhaimi mahadi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good putter. However is a little lightweight for me and doesn't forgive that much.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It is a good basic putter with extra head weight to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this putter for my son. He really likes it. It is a good basic putter with extra head weight to make it easier to keet square and follow through.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: ... putting definitely improved weight wasn't as heavy as I'd like it to be though but it works
customer_reviews.text: My putting definitely improved weight wasn't as heavy as I'd like it to be though but it works
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mensen

customer_reviews.title: Only the price is cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best putter for the money out there. Feels like it oughta cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Job

customer_reviews.title: Putter that we received DO NOT look like the putter pictured
customer_reviews.text: Putter that we received DO NOT look like the putter pictured. The ones delivered do seem to hit well. But I was expecting the ones in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Just received this club for my son today and is what i got is not the one on the picture...it looks totally different..very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Wilson Staff Harmonized M4 Golf Putter
customer_reviews.text: This putter is OK; however, I did change the original grip for a "fatter" one, to enhance the feel during putts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota "Joe"

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for such a low price. It is a nicely balanced square blade and tie. Very solid strike on the ball. Replacing my top flite mallet putter since I bought new Wilson irons and bag. My biggest complaint is that none of the come with user guides. Seems like my putts go left or a little too far past the hole or not quite to the hole. There must be adjustments on the hardware that will prevent this anomaly if I just had an illustrated user guide. User error has been suggested but it is the same user on each shot. 😂 LOL
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance, works great ,nice weight.grip is really nice. Couldn't ask for a better putter, price is exactly as it should be. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: GONZOMARINE69

customer_reviews.title: Good putter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really seems to help with putting alignment. Lighter weight than some of the higher priced mallet heads. No glare on sunny days. Good putter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and anything are so good.... But head of putter some scratch ..... I dont understand new product?????
customer_reviews.author: WanKi PARK

product_meta.title: Wilson Harmonized M Putter
product_meta.description: Features: The Wilson Harmonized M1 putter features a heel/toe weighting head design and a plumber hosel. Easy Alignment Design - Horizontal lines on the putter head visually support alignment for a more accurate setup. Vertical Seam Grip - The midsize Harmonized putter grip features a vertical seam on the back side to improve feel throughout the stroke. Face Insert - The micro-injection polymer face insert improves feel upon contact with the golf ball. Putter Shape - Square Heel And Toe Player Type - Recreational The Wilson Harmonized M2 putter features a semi-mallet head design and a plumber hosel. Easy Alignment Design - Horizontal lines on the putter head visually support alignment for a more accurate setup. Vertical Seam Grip - The midsize Harmonized putter grip features a vertical seam on the back side to improve feel throughout the stroke. Face Insert - The microinjection polymer face insert improves feel upon contact with the golf ball. Putter Shape - Semi Mallet Length - 35 in - 88.9 cm Player Type - Recreational The Wilson Harmonized M3 putter features a toe heavy head design and a gooseneck hosel. Easy Alignment Design - Horizontal lines on the putter head visually support alignment for a more accurate setup. Vertical Seam Grip - The midsize Harmonized putter grip features a vertical seam on the back side to improve feel throughout the stroke.
